articles.author: Simonetta Di Pippo
articles.title: Humans are going back to the moon to stay, but when that will be is becoming less clear - Phys.org
articles.description: A 2019 Time magazine cover portrayed four astronauts running towards the moon. Pictured alongside the headline "The Next Space Race," one of the astronauts carried an American flag, one carried a Chinese flag and the other two belonged to space companies owne…
